comments.body:
This seems like a very confusing API. Postgres requires importing a legacy API? :thinking:

I guess you have to use oracle if you want the non-legacy API?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +11,15 @@import doobie._
import doobie.implicits._
// legacy versions required for postgres see https://github.com/tpolecat/doobie/releases/tag/v0.8.8
import doobie.implicits.legacy.instant._
import doobie.implicits.legacy.localdate._

comments.body: This can be a constant, don't know if `Fragment.const` is actually heavy or not.
